calcCollAmountForRatio(uint256).details: calc how much collateral amount has to be added to have a ratio

params._ratio: ratio to reach, percentage with no decimals (180 means 180%)

returns.collDiff: collateral amount to add or to subtract to reach that ratio

calcRatioAddingCollateral(uint256).details: calc a new ratio if collateral amount has added to contract balance

calculatingAccruedInterests(uint256).details: calculate accrued interests of the contract

checkEarlySettledLoan().details: check if loan is in early settlement period

getAccruedInterests().details: get accrued interests of the contract

getActualCollateralRatio().details: get the collateral ratio of the loan (subtracting the accrued interests)

getShareHolderPlace(address).details: get a shareholder place in shareholders array

initiateLoanForeClose().details: set the loan in foreclosure state for undercollateralized loans (tbd: reward for caller)

isShareHolder(address).details: check if an address is a shareholder

lenderSendStableCoins(address).details: lender sends required stable coins to borrower and set the initial lender as a stakeholder (100%)

params._stableAddr: , address of the stabl coin address

loanClosingByBorrower().details: settle the loan in normal closing state by borrower

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setLoanCancelled().details: set the loan in cancelled state (only if pending)

setLoanInForeclosedByTime().details: set the loan in foreclosed state when foreclosureWindow time passed

setLoanStatusOnCollRatio().details: set the status of the loan based on collateral ratio

setNewCommonParams().details: set common parameters in loan contract, reading them from factory

setNewFeesParams().details: set common parameters in loan contract, reading them from factory

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawInterests().details: withdraw accreud interests for all shareholders and set the status after interests withdrawal
